name: Erich Fromm
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of frankfurt school.

name: Henryk Grossman
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of frankfurt school.

name: Herbert Marcuse
description: German-American philosopher, sociologist, and political theorist associated with the Frankfurt School. Developed critical theory and was a major influence on the New Left movements of the 1960s.

name: JÃ¼rgen Habermas
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of frankfurt school.

name: Leo Lowenthal
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of frankfurt school.

name: Max Horkheimer
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of frankfurt school.

name: Theodor Adorno
description: German philosopher, sociologist, psychologist, musicologist, and composer. Co-founder of the Frankfurt School. Developed critical theory and wrote extensively on culture, music, and aesthetics.

name: Walter Benjamin
description: German Jewish philosopher, cultural critic and essayist. Associated with the Frankfurt School. Wrote on art, literature, history, and modernity. Influential in aesthetic and Marxist theory.

works.title: The Work of Art in the Age of Mechanical Reproduction
Theses on the Philosophy of History
